text: @chrislhayes All you need to know about the Republican Party to know it is completely off the rails is that it’s gone from being the Party whose leader once said “just say no to drugs,” to the Party whose leader now suggests injecting disinfectant to kill the Coronavirus. WTF folks. Wake up.
